snippet: A center in Belfast is expected to draw women from across Ireland, where abortion remains highly restricted.
abstract: British nonprofit organization Marie Stopes International says it will open abortion clinic in Belfast, first ever on the island of Ireland, raising fury from anti-abortion campaigners who promise to pressure local politicians to refuse to grant operating license.
lead_paragraph: A center in Belfast is expected to draw women from across Ireland, where abortion remains highly restricted.

headline.seo: Abortion Clinic to Open in Northern Ireland
headline.main: Belfast Clinic for Abortions Due to Open
headline.print_headline: Belfast Clinic For Abortions Due to Open
